member.name: T:Samraksh.VirtualFence.Base
member.summary: This program listens for radio packets and prints information about identity, sig nal strength, etc. It also periodically sends radio packets that another mote can listen to. It can help you debug another program by "sniffing" what's coming over the radio.

member.name: M:Samraksh.VirtualFence.Base.Main
member.summary: Set up things for the Base Node
